channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Full recycling bin for small electric devices, 17th February
item.description:
On the pedestrianised street adjacent to Courtaulds Road, N19, the recycling container for small electrical devices is full. Please can you empty it.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 89-91, Holland Walk, Archway, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Dead Fox in Alexandra recreation just on Maitland Road, 17th February
item.description:
Fox is dead in the park – it is used a lot by a dog owners and families so it would be great to clear as soon as possible so disease doesn’t spread

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Maitland Road, Penge, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: A fridge has been abandoned on the pavement for at least 3 weeks., 17th February
item.description:
Right in the front of cadogan close in Albemarle road there is a fridge left on the pavement with no room for a stroller or a wheelchair to pass by and today it has fallen down probably because of the wind. This is dangerous for people passing by.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Bromley Road, Shortlands, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: A never ending issue, 17th February
item.description:
Fly tipping on out street will continue until the council will mandate the building management to lock their bins in the recycling facility. This situation is unacceptable.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Oakley Place, Old Kent Road, Greater London

item.title: Light not working on lamp with 20mph sign on it, 17th February
item.description:
The light on the lamp with the 20mph road sign isn’t working & hasn’t worked for months. I’ve reported previously & been told it’s been fixed but it hasn’t. Please note it’s the lamp with the 20mph sign on it.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Elmstead Lane, Elmstead, Greater London
